org.objectrepository.mets
[Groovy] Class MetsService

java.lang.Object
  org.objectrepository.mets.MetsService

class MetsService

MetsService Offer a view to the stored files: - physical: the files are grouped by bucket and in order of sequence (if any)

Method Detail

metsFile

private java.lang.String metsFile(java.lang.String na, java.lang.Object buckets, java.lang.String objid)
writeMetsFile Output the METS object to the writer. Strategy: - use the corresponding objid or fileSet\label combination to get a sorted list. Sorting is by seq - for each found level, produce a fileSec.
